caption.p: Principal component analysis (PCA) of soil properties in different D. angustifolia populations. Gray arrows indicate environmental factors, the red squares indicate D. angustifolia sampling plots. TC: total organic carbon, TN: total nitrogen, C/N: carbon–nitrogen ratio, NH 4⁺-N: ammonium nitrogen, NO 3 −-N: nitrate nitrogen, TP: total phosphorus, TK: total potassium, AN: available nitrogen, AP: available phosphorus, AK: available potassium, Moisture: water content, ST: soil temperature.
